The three major areas of study within ethics are:<ref name="iep.utm.edu"/>
 
The three major areas of study within ethics are:<ref name="iep.utm.edu"/>
    −
#[[Meta-ethics]], concern the theoretical definitions and references of moral propositions, and how their [[truth value]]s can be determined
+
#[[Meta-ethics]], concerning the theoretical meaning and reference of moral propositions, and how their [[truth value]]s (if any) can be determined
−
#[[Normative ethics]], concern the practical means of determining a moral course of action
+
#[[Normative ethics]], concerning the practical means of determining a moral course of action
−
#[[Applied ethics]], concern ethical theory, which asks: “What is a person is obligated to do, in a specific situation?” and “What is a person to do in a particular domain of action?”<ref name="iep.utm.edu"/>
+
#[[Applied ethics]], concerning what a person is obligated to do in a specific situation or a particular domain of action<ref name="iep.utm.edu"/>
